txt.en: Tamindur
'Hearken to me! The time has come to prove ourselves worthy of our ancestors! Attack!'
Sneering, the Iron Crown commander points at Thr√°stan!
Instance: Awakening
'Follow me, little one.'
'None have ever dared so boldly to defile the cradle of Durin the Deathless...'
'Even if we should fail in our conquest of Gundabad, let us drive every foe from Gloomingtarn!'
'You have come unbidden to the sacred tarn, Man.'
'You were unwise and did not heed the warnings wrought in stone, but now you shall.'
'All must depart except the Eldest House.'
'Death awaits the unwelcome.'
'What is this now? Some trick of the mind? It will not avail you, dwarves!'
'Move aside, stone-beast! My prize awaits me!'
'What have you done!? Stay back! Stay away from me!''
'Fear not what you will soon behold, my friend. You will come to no harm--and neither will I.'
'Durin is returned at last and the will of my lord in the Uttermost West shall be done!'
'Farewell, [placeholder].'
'Foolish dwarves! The Wakening Stone is ours!'
'Death, then...'
'But not for us!'
'You underestimate us, Longbeards.'
'The forge will be ours--with or without that old fool of a dwarf!'
'My master, Allaban, has followed you hither with the full force of the Iron Crown behind him.'
'So choose your fate...'
'Surrender... or die by my master's hand.'
'So be it. Slay them all!'
